Vicious_Bite.help: You deliver a powerful bite to your target, infecting the wound with saliva. This causes toxic damage, as well as minor lethal damage due to bleeding.
Vicious_Bite.targetHelp: You are bleeding, suffering lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Maiming_Bite.help: You lunge and sink your teeth into your target, infecting the wound with saliva. This causes toxic and lethal damage while also reducing the target's movement speed for a short time.
Maiming_Bite.targetHelp: Your movement speeds and defense against all types of damage have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Throat_Bite.help: You charge your foe, snapping at them in an attempt to knock them off guard. This snapping action infects the wound, causing toxic and lethal damage and reduces the target's defense.
Throat_Bite.targetHelp: Your defense has been reduced by the Feral Charge.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Chilling_Howl.help: You unleash a narrow cone of arctic air that chills foes causing, cold damage which lingers for a short while. Additionally, the target's movement and attack speeds are reduced.
Chilling_Howl.targetHelp: You are suffering cold damage over time and reductions in both movement and attack speeds.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Freezing_Roar.help: You unleash a narrow cone of arctic air that chills foes causing, cold damage which lingers for a short while. Additionally, the target's movement and attack speeds are reduced.
Freezing_Roar.targetHelp: You are suffering cold damage over time and reductions in both movement and attack speeds.

Terrible_Howl.help: You unleash a dreadful roar which causes lingering cold damage and terrorizes your opponents. Affected targets also suffer reduced movement and attack speeds for a short time.
Terrible_Howl.shortHelp: PBAoE, High DMG(Cold), Minor DoT(Cold), Terrorize(Foe) -Speed(Foe, All), -Rech(Foe)
Terrible_Howl.targetHelp: You are afraid and are suffering from reduced movement and attack speeds.

Will_of_the_Wild.help: When you are low on health, you will find inner strength. This causes you to suffer significantly less damage for a short time and recover a portion of your health.
Will_of_the_Wild.shortHelp: Self, Heal(Self), +Max HP, +Res(Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold)
